fixes.name: Delta Down T
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the calculated field Delta Down T which directly references the row-level column [DELTA_DOWN] to a calculated column in DAX. Row-level direct mapping uses the table[column] reference format.

fixes.name: Delta Down T USD
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression [Delta Down T]*[TO_USD] to DAX using table[column] references. This is row-level arithmetic so it is a calculated column.

fixes.name: Fix Value T
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau ZN([Sheet1 - Value]) to DAX COALESCE([Sheet1 - Value], 0). This is row-level null-to-zero replacement, so created as a calculated column.

fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 30Y
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR base = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
VAR term = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    term = "30 Yr" || term = "30 Yr Swap" || term = "40 Yr" || term = "40 Yr Swap" || term = "50 Yr" || term = "50 Yr Swap" || term = "60 Yr" || term = "60 Yr Swap" || term = "70 Yr" || term = "70 Yr Swap", base,
    term = "12 Yr" || term = "12 Yr Swap", base * 1/10,
    term = "15 Yr" || term = "15 Yr Swap", base * 1/4,
    term = "20 Yr" || term = "20 Yr Swap", base * 1/2,
    term = "25 Yr" || term = "25 Yr Swap", base * 3/4,
    term = "11 Yr" || term = "11 Yr Swap", base * 1/20,
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the Tableau IF sequence as a DAX expression using VARs and SWITCH(TRUE()). All column references use the table[column] format. The logic applies at row level (checks TERM_LABEL and computes a fraction of the row-level sum), so it is implemented as a calculated column.
